Hello <@U02UC7KFZ28>
Thanks for your answer :slightly_smiling_face:
However, if I understood correctly, HubSpot API is to do request TO hubsbost. What i'm trying to do here is requesting our API FROM a workflow action in HubSpot
For that, look into <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/custom-cards|CRM Cards>. They might serve ur needs.
How do I specify "amount" correctly for a deal when sending responses to HubSpot? It's showing me "invalid property" for "Amount".
